section.name: Development Road Map
section.p: This document discusses the release plans and current roadmap for Maven.
Note that we will continue with the successful technique from Maven 1.0 of making plugins available on a separate release schedule so that new features can be obtained as they are ready and tested.

subsection.name: Maven 2.0.x
subsection.p: Aims and features: Bugfixes found in the Maven core will be released as interim updates leading up to the Maven 2.1 development stream.

subsection.name: Maven 2.1
subsection.p: Aims and features: Features to be added after the freeze on Maven 2.0 will be slated for a 2.1 release in 2006.
